snippet: A white school police officer is seen flipping a black female high school student backward in her desk and dragging her on the floor.

byline.original: By RICHARD FAUSSET and ASHLEY SOUTHALL

abstract: South Carolina authorities are investigating encounter captured on video that shows white Police Officer Ben Fields grabbing black Spring Valley High School student by neck and throwing her across floor after he was called to classroom for help with a disruption; Richland County School District board members say removal of officer will be top priority for seven-member school board.
lead_paragraph: A white school police officer is seen flipping a black female high school student backward in her desk and dragging her on the floor.

headline.print_headline: Videos Show Officer Flipping and Dragging Student, Bringing Inquiry
headline.main: Video Shows Officer Flipping Student in South Carolina, Prompting Inquiry
